√krudh 'be angry'

present: [4.] krúdhyati etc. AV.+  krúdhyate etc. E.+  

perfect: cukrodha  cukrudhus etc. B.+  

aorist: [2.] krudhat etc. AV.+   -- [3.] ácukrudhat etc.  

[future: krotsyati  kroddhā  ]

verbal: kruddhá V.+  kroddhum  kruddhvā  

secondary: intensive: cokrudh-   -- desiderative: cukrutsa-   -- causative: krodháyati etc. AV.+  krodhyate  

derivatives: krudh  krúdhmi RV.  kródha AV.+  krodhana E.+  krodhanīya E.
